Title: Genji Monogatari
Description: ['Based on the literary work of Shikibu Murasaki, ', Genji Monogatari, " is a story of the Emperor's second son born by a courtier. Made a commoner, he served as a retainer to the court."]
Staff: [['Sugii, Gisaburou', 'Director'], ['Sadamoto, Yoshiyuki', 'Key Animation'], ['Maeda, Mahiro', 'Key Animation'], ['Nakura, Yasuhiro', 'Character Design, Animation Director']]
